summary: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.
cast: Henry Fonda|Dana Andrews|Mary Beth Hughes|Anthony Quinn|William Eythe|Harry Morgan|Jane Darwell|Matt Briggs|Harry Davenport|Frank Conroy|Marc Lawrence|Paul Hurst|Victor Kilian|Chris-Pin Martin|Willard Robertson|Ted North|C.E. Anderson|Stanley Andrews|Hank Bell|William 'Billy' Benedict|Paul E. Burns|George Chandler|Tex Cooper|Forrest Dillon|Dan Dix|Larry Dods|Tex Driscoll|Francis Ford|Margaret Hamilton|Rondo Hatton|Don House|George Lloyd|Tom London|Frank McGrath|George Meeker|Frank Orth|George Plues|Dick Rich|Ed Richard|Walt Robbins|Almira Sessions|Clint Sharp|Ben Watson|Leigh Whipper
title: Incidente en Ox-Bow
